metadata.summary: Hub page for Soteria managed detection rulesets covering EDR, AWS, and M365
metadata.primary_use_case: Navigate to specific Soteria ruleset documentation

cross_refs.description: General context about managed rulesets before diving into Soteria specifics
Soteria EDR rules are the endpoint-focused subset of Soteria rules
Soteria AWS rules are the cloud-focused subset of Soteria rules
Soteria M365 rules are the Microsoft 365 subset of Soteria rules
